com.github.nscuro.wdm.binary

Interface BinaryManager


  • public interface BinaryManager
    A manager for WebDriver binaries.
    Since:
    0.2.0

    • Method Detail

      • getWebDriverBinary

        @Nonnull
File getWebDriverBinary(Browser browser,
                                 @Nullable
                                 String version,
                                 Os os,
                                 Architecture architecture)
                          throws IOException
        Get a WebDriver binary.
        Parameters:
        browser - The Browser to get the WebDriver binary for
        version - The version of the WebDriver binary to get. When null, the latest version will be used
        os - The Os the binary must be compatible with
        architecture - The Architecture the binary must be compatible with
        Returns:
        The WebDriver binary
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of a network or file error

      • registerWebDriverBinary

        void registerWebDriverBinary(Browser browser,
                             File webDriverBinaryFile)
        Register a given File as the WebDriver binary for a given Browser.
        Parameters:
        browser - The Browser to register the WebDriver binary for
        webDriverBinaryFile - The binary File to register
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - When the given File does not exist or is a directory
        UnsupportedOperationException - When the given Browser does not support WebDriver binaries

      • getLocalWebDriverBinaries

        @Nonnull
List<File> getLocalWebDriverBinaries()
        Returns:
        All locally stored WebDriver binary Files

      • getLatestWebDriverBinary

        @Nonnull
default File getLatestWebDriverBinary(Browser browser)
                                        throws IOException
        Get the latest WebDriver binary (Os and Architecture will be auto-detected).
        Parameters:
        browser - The Browser to get the WebDriver binary for
        Returns:
        The WebDriver binary
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of a network or file error

      • getWebDriverBinary

        @Nonnull
default File getWebDriverBinary(Browser browser,
                                         String version)
                                  throws IOException
        Get a specific version of a WebDriver binary (Os and Architecture will be auto-detected).
        Parameters:
        browser - The Browser to get the WebDriver binary for
        version - The version of the WebDriver binary to get. When null, the latest version will be used
        Returns:
        The WebDriver binary
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of a network or file error

        @Nonnull
default File getLatestWebDriverBinary(Browser browser,
                                               Os os,
                                               Architecture architecture)
                                        throws IOException
        Get the latest WebDriver binary.
        Parameters:
        browser - The Browser to get the WebDriver binary for
        os - The Os the binary must be compatible with
        architecture - The Architecture the binary must be compatible with
        Returns:
        The WebDriver binary
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of a network or file error

      • createDefault

        @Nonnull
static BinaryManager createDefault()
        Get the default BinaryManager.

        Use this instead of builder() if you don't need to perform any customizations.

        The following BinaryProviders are included: 

             - ChromeDriverBinaryProvider
     - MicrosoftWebDriverBinaryProvider
     - GeckoDriverBinaryProvider
     - IEDriverServerBinaryProvider
     - OperaChromiumDriverBinaryProvider
        Returns:
        A BinaryManager instance
        See Also:
        BinaryManager.Builder.HttpClientStep.defaultHttpClient(), BinaryManager.Builder.BinaryDestinationDirStep.defaultBinaryDestinationDir()

      • builder

        @Nonnull
static BinaryManager.Builder.HttpClientStep builder()
